description:
With this course, I wanted to focus on vocal mixing, trying to cover every possible aspect, in an essential way, as I'd do for my tracks.

A walk through on the vocal of one of my new tracks featuring the singer Tane Welham, where I'll analyze the best plug-ins for every sort of effect, and show to you how to use them in the essential; together with other standard techniques that I didn't used for this song in particular.

In the course I make use of Logic Pro, but all of the things I do are applicable to any digital audio workstation (daw).

Also, I often refer to Waves plug-ins, so having Waves installed for your daw is highly recommended (since they are a common choice for many effects too), please find them at http://www.waves.com (and do not pirate them on websites like audioz.info).

NEW! >> Added english speech text available for download (and possible translation through google translate for example)

Met

follow: facebook.com/musicmet
check other courses: udemy.com/electronicmusicproduction
title: Vocal Mixing
